testcase.name: Reset the password for buildxact users
testcase.system-out: Given I launch "Chrome" browser session.....................................passed When I navigate to Buildxact application....................................passed And I login to Buildxact application as per "TestCase1".....................passed Then I verify if the login is successful or not.............................passed Then I reset the user's password under My Profile...........................passed And I logout from Buildxact application.....................................passed Then I navigate to the user's mailbox, open the Password Reset mail and reset the password as per "TestCase1".passed And I logout from Buildxact application.....................................passed Then I login to the Buildxact application with the new password as per "TestCase1".passed And I verify if the login is successful or not..............................passed And I logout from Buildxact application.....................................passed Then I login to Buildxact application as per "TestCase1"....................passed And I verify if the login is successful or not after password reset with old password.passed
